title: Lovely beach and great hospitality
text:
We stayed for 2 weeks during Xmas time. They have very nice pools - private, villa and a common one; and of course the hotel beach. Hotel staff is very friendly and cordial. To name few individuals for their excellent services : Zed,Saurav,Nisu,Sabin,Jenny,Ripsu,Bow,Pumkin,Ryan and Ruby. Breakfast area is lovely and live mild music was special treat. All in all fantastic place to stay and relax.

We however do have some recommendations for the resort staff.

1- please have shuttle service to the main ride more often than every two hours. It’s just bad and not properly lit during night - 1.5 km road to walk.
2-keep the restaurant prices a bit more attractive for the beach area.

Else, all good and great. And yes, your Xmas dinner program was very well done with all specials. Thank you for that.

title: Awesome Indian food at relatively simple restaurant
text: This is a hidden gem in Koh Chang. We tried other Indian restaurants but once we had dinner here , we went almost a week daily to the place. It’s simple restaurant but with very tasty food - especially the paneer dishes. Home made green chilli chutney is perfect dip. Service is excellent.

title: Amazing food where I would not have thought of
text: Reached Dorint airport hotel in Stuttgart around 22:00 and thought of getting some basic food at hotel's fantastic bar/restaurant. There I found Kashmir restaurant with Indian food. Just 100 meter walk! Fantastic vegetarian food and basmati rice with whole cardamom was a delight. Certainly looking forward to going there again.

title: Enjoy the ancient culture
text: Nothing more to add than any classical description... it's breathtakingly beautiful..easily accessible with 20 euro/person ticket price.

title: Awesome food, great service
text: Today by chance we walked into the restaurant Zafran . They created two Indian paneer based dishes even they were not on their menu. Even roti they prepared in Indian way. Very friendly service and with their willingness to walk extra mile, I would recommend this restaurant to anyone .. thank you to Zafran team!

title: Service not best and fast as expected
text: flight service was very slow and it tooks the at least 4 passengers sitting in different corners of the plane for stewardess to realize that Flight's entertainment system was not working for a very long time after the doors were closed and flight took off. Also, the meal/drink service was delayed for no apparent reason. In short - did not feel that its a "First class airlines" !

title: Lots of choices of freshly prepared quality food and friendly service
text:
In our recent visit at Sheraton Koh Samui, we visited Coco Spice restaurant for breakfast regularly. It's a nice restaurant with great view. Freshly prepared warm breakfast and lots of variety of vegetarian dishes, with ever smiling faces of team working there made our day.

What struck me tge most was that Mr. Asker Bay, being executive Chef kept closed contact with all guests. Everyday he asked everyone of us whether we are enjoying breakfast, thus showing personal interest. Also, by and of breakfast time, he had his breakfast in the same hall where we had our breakfast. Thus showing "he eats what he prepares". Wonderful example of leadership in gastronomy!!

Great place with quality food and quality fresh juices..

title: Very cool place
text: Just by chance we found this place and happily surprised by the quality and variety of food. Very friendly service too...

title: Unbelievable good food and service
text: Indian food is so delicious, almost like home-made. It's a family owned and run restaurant. Service is very friendly and prices are ok. If you are in this area and like Indian food, this place is a must !!!
What a fantastic place and such a friendly service from Barry ! We were happily surprised by delicious food at non-expensive price. If you are in this are, it's a must !!!

title: Amazing service + great location = Awesome experience (high recommendation) !!
text:
This is a great resort with lots of facilities. Multiple swimming pools (including huge infinity pool with a sea view) and on the beach provide great relaxation. Not too far from the Kos city (bus ride from in-front of hotel, 4 bus stations, 2 euro/person ticket). Perhaps all these, one can expect from a resort however, what stunned me is the level of personalised service. I can write an essay with lots of experience I have gather but I will focus on few individuals with whom we interacted the most. This does not mean that others were any less ..

Starting from reception : Alan : very friendly person with articulate conversation. Then we were brought to room with a golf cart and during the short ride, Gerorge explained all the facilities and specialities.

Breakfast: Eva Revani, Angelo, Hermes and others : read any need before we could express :) very friendly services. Big breakfast buffet and especially for a vegetarian person like me, lots of warm and cold choices. Freshly prepared healthy smoothies, and even champagne to delight.

Dinner: Lea, the hostess every day welcomed individually with a cocktail at dinner room. A very friendly person with big smile. My wife and I were always went in to the dinner room with happy face where we again had great choices (including vegetarian) food. Service from Alex and Geralda Torraj was lovely. Since terrace is preferred location for most of the guest for dinner, they managed the guest quick and very cordially. Of course, with big smile...

Beach side pool: Athena and Leola serve beverages, cocktails .. nice and happy person.

Evening bar: every day, there were different shows (Latin Dance, Greek Dance, Belly dance etc.) .. very professional and friendly dancers. They just did not perform and vanish .. they made sure that after every performance, the guest dance with them to make the environment livelier ..they provided basic lessons in these different dance style which made happy event for shaking the legs :) Alex, George were outstanding while serving variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks !

All in all : great people, finest food, many amenities gave us great one week of experience has certainly raised our expectation bar for other resorts in next vacation !!

title: never thought We would get such authentic and great food in Takaka !!
text: Awesome good and very friendly service ! What stunned me was the quality of (veg) pizza ! Very lively environment too and great ambience !

title: Disappointing in simple words ! Warning : Check your food for glass splinter and living ants before you eat !
text:
Big disappointment! Being at prime location, we assumed the food and services will be great ! we visited with big family for brunch. All in all - 10 people. In 10 dishes, following faults :
1) Living and moving Ant in Salad - Manager's explanation : we use fresh food so it can happen.
2) Glass splinter in drink - Manager's explanation : It's human, it can happen.
3) In a fruit pancake, no fruit: Manager's explanation : yes, but you got it after you complained.
4) In a egg item, egg was absent.: Manager's explanation : you did not complain about it.
5) Very hardened toast bread : Manager's explanation: none !

It took us a very long argument with the manager to convince her that this is not acceptable. In stead of saying - oh we are sorry and why don't you try our 3 euro ice-cream as our cordial apology, she was convincing that its your good right not to come here or not to recommend us further !! that was something ..

We as family agreed that all this hassle could have been forgotten and forgiven, if the manager would have tried to solve the issue in stead showing the attitude !

At least "Spree Gold at Ku'damm" is done for us ! Never again !

title: Nice place, friendly staff and peaceful place to relax with family
text:
The haveli resort is a very nice place to stay with family. Rooms are very well decorated. Food is excellent. Staff is very friendly. Plenty of opportunity to visit surrounding places. Hotel itself has many recreational equipments like billiard, table tennis, carom and of course - swimming pool.

Place is good to enjoy with family ..

title: awesome food and great ambience
text: fully and pleasantly surprised by the number of dishes. Restaurant has managed to create real experience of Indian Railway (especially - the rail and surrounding real noise at background). Great Service too !

title: Camping straight in front of room
text: Very much surprised by seeing camps straight in front of room door ! Car parked next to the tents on green ! Did not expect it :-/ may be in off season it's good place but now looks like you are trying to make money of every sqaure foot of your property! Would not recommend anyone and will check out at soonest :-/

title: feels like you are in fairy-tale land
text: as soon as we saw the property - we felt, we were in fairy-tale land. Amazing surroundings. Very classical entrance and rooms takes you back in time. Beautiful place and nice verandah side doors/windows. Reception team is very warm and friendly. Take care of the need and suggests nice location for the village. Would love to go there again ..

title: Awesome, quite place to stay at
text: Radiant Jepun Villa is in quite corner, though not any far from the main street. Mr. Adi - the operation manager is one of those special guys : friendly, always-smiling and caring. Rooms are specious, and of classic nature. Would recommend everyone who loves peace and romantic corner ..

title: lovely small coffee place ..
text: its a small place with unexpected good quality of coffee ... espresso is awesome. Staff is very friendly and forthcoming. its not too far from the main street too.

title: very nice and friendly business hotel with apartment rooms
text:
Highly impressed by hospitality and personal interest taken to resolve a small issue by Hotel manager , Mr. Gottschlich! :-)

Its a nice hotel near City center. Good food at hotel restaurant.

Apartment rooms are best for short stay.

title: very friendly and authentic food
text: service is the best ..! friendly staff and enough space to have peaceful meal :) try the salad - Dante !

title: Wonderful place with great people
text:
i would recommend everyone to stay at The Lovina Resort ! People are very friendly, exceptional service, great location. Swimming pools (yes, two of them !) are big. Fitness room has decent equipment. Few supermarkets around here as well for grocery shopping, Surrounding is certainly not for people who want to have a busy, hectic and loud life (for that you should stay in Kuta). I can write more about resort, facilities and surrounding - but the most important experience we had was friendlies, eagerness to help and readiness to go an extra mile for customer satisfaction of the staff : be it a sweeper, room-cleaner, pool boy, receptionist or manager ! Once the pool boy even apologized that it rained on that day - can anyone be more expressive in worrying about happiness of the guests ?!

Once you are there, do visit Global Village Cafe and Buda Bakery & Restaurant.

title: Great location, nice staff
text: We stayed two weeks. Highlights: got upgraded to Villa without extra charge, the location is great with swimming pool and beach close to each other , long clean beach for a nice walk, west side open sea so beautiful sunset view, great massage facility on beach, resort close to Ao Nang and Krabi so u r near to happening and still in quite place, big and variety breakfast, very friendly staff - especially restaurant manager Mr. Panasit who walked an extra mile for my fiancé' birthday celebration!

title: Friendly team
text: short stay of 5 days. Hotel is near the underground and bus station which brings pretty quick to inner city. hotel has all basic amenities but what is striking is the service - at reception, at breakfast. that team always delivered an extra mile.

title: Excellent restaurant
text: Restaurant is situated at very good location .. very good view of Prague from top. Service is very friendly, food is nice and being small restaurant, it does give a homely feeling. Nice place for a romantic dinner :-)

title: Good location
text:
the hotel is just a few steps from the beach
very friendly and helpful staff
food and drinks are a bit overpriced compared to the restaurants around, but quality is good
The hotel is good for relaxation, otherwise there is not much going on in the near area. Phuket is about 90 min drive.
